Description: Blue glazed steatite shabti of Padiamenemipet with a lappet-wig(incomplete), a modelled face and crossed hands in relief holding two hoes and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the leg section is inscribed with six(remaining) rows of Hieroglyphic text; the lower leg section is lost. Modern?
Condition: incomplete - part of the head and the lower-leg section lost
